# [CentOS 7 安装 JAVA环境（JDK 1.8）](https://www.cnblogs.com/stulzq/p/9286878.html)

## 1.打开url选择jdk1.8下载

[http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html)

我选择linux x64版本：

![1531155386708](https://images2018.cnblogs.com/blog/668104/201807/668104-20180710013042030-1928795035.png)

## 2.下载

```
wget http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u171-b11/512cd62ec5174c3487ac17c61aaa89e8/jdk-8u171-linux-x64.tar.gz?AuthParam=1531155951_4e06a4d17c6c1dbfb8440352e19dd2ae
```

> 该下载地址已失效 请自行在官网复制下载地址

下载以后通过命令检查安装包大小是否符合

```
ls -lht
```

![1531157360711](https://images2018.cnblogs.com/blog/668104/201807/668104-20180710013041607-1295237356.png)

## 3.安装

（1）创建安装目录

```
mkdir /usr/local/java/
```

（2）解压至安装目录

```
tar -zxvf jdk-8u171-linux-x64.tar.gz -C /usr/local/java/
```

## 4.设置环境变量

打开文件

```
vim /etc/profile
```

在末尾添加

```
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/java/jdk1.8.0_171
export JRE_HOME=${JAVA_HOME}/jre
export CLASSPATH=.:${JAVA_HOME}/lib:${JRE_HOME}/lib
export PATH=${JAVA_HOME}/bin:$PATH
```

使环境变量生效

```
source /etc/profile
```

添加软链接

```
ln -s /usr/local/java/jdk1.8.0_171/bin/java /usr/bin/java
```

检查

```
java -version
```
